mapper.sql: ID, NAME, BIRTHDAY, SEX, USERNAME, PASSWORD, LOGIN_FLAG, ROLE_ID, FILE_PATH, CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into t_user ( ID, NAME, BIRTHDAY, SEX, USERNAME, PASSWORD, LOGIN_FLAG, ROLE_ID, FILE_PATH, CREATE_DATE ) values ( seq_user.nextval, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginFlag, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{roleId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )
